```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F,warning = F, message = F)
SciViews::R
library(data.table)

# Import dataset
sdd_dt <- data.table::fread("data/sdd_dt.csv")
```

Cette application shiny a pour objectif de proposer un outils de détection des difficultés des étudiants.

```{r}
sdd_dt[ , c("date", "tutorial", "version", "user_name", "event", "data", "tuto_label") := list(
   parse_datetime(date), 
   factor(tutorial), 
   factor(version, levels = c("1.0.0", "1.1.0", "1.2.0"), ordered = TRUE ),
   factor(user_name),
   factor(event),
   NULL,
   factor(tuto_label)
   )]
ord <- rev(levels(sdd_dt$tutorial))
```


```{r}
chart(data = sdd_dt, fct_relevel(tutorial, ord) ~ date %fill=% tutorial) +
  ggridges::geom_density_ridges(show.legend = F) +
  labs( x = "Temps", y = "Tutoriels")
```
